5.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

53.movie_plot: An off the charts genius who is home schooled and shunned after his last relative dies shows the unconscious residents of his town about connection awareness and the generosity of the spirit.

128.movie_plot: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

27.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

207.movie_plot: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding killer and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

187.movie_plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

102.movie_plot: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

42.movie_plot: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurrences.

266.movie_plot: A demonic djinn attempts to grant its owner three wishes, which will allow him to summon his brethren to Earth.

157.movie_plot: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

200.movie_name: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid (1992)
200.movie_plot: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

175.movie_plot: Several people are hunted by a cruel serial killer who kills his victims in their dreams. While the survivors are trying to find the reason for being chosen, the murderer won't lose any chance to kill them as soon as they fall asleep.

67.movie_plot: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

59.movie_plot: When a girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

246.movie_name: Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master, A (1988)
246.movie_plot: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.

94.movie_name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970)
94.movie_plot: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

65.movie_plot: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

237.movie_name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988)
237.movie_plot: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece on Halloween. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?

111.movie_plot: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.

91.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
91.movie_plot: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

163.movie_name: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer (1998)
163.movie_plot: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

143.movie_plot: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

11.movie_plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

17.movie_plot: Three trappers protect a British Colonel's daughters in the midst of the French and Indian War.

57.movie_plot: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

109.movie_plot: Take two rival television reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one Producer, female. Mix well, and watch the sparks fly.

126.movie_plot: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

239.movie_name: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers (1995)
239.movie_plot: Six years after Michael Myers last terrorized Haddonfield, he returns there in pursuit of his niece, Jamie Lloyd, who has escaped with her newborn child, for which Michael and a mysterious cult have sinister plans.

119.movie_plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

8.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
8.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

181.movie_plot: After a tragic car accident kills his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead to con people. However, when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.

82.movie_plot: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

117.movie_name: I Know What You Did Last Summer (1997)

172.movie_plot: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, a new Ghostface begins to terrorize them once again.

171.movie_plot: One hundred fifty dead, and three hundred fifty missing in the tiny mountain town of Snowfield, Colorado, and that's only the beginning.

60.movie_plot: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

223.movie_plot: Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind.

92.movie_plot: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

153.movie_plot: A colorful array of characters compete at a national dog show.

18.movie_plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

122.movie_plot: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

100.movie_plot: Humans in a fascistic, militaristic future do battle with giant alien bugs in a fight for survival.

28.movie_plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

160.movie_plot: A young couple moves in to an apartment only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. When the wife becomes mysteriously pregnant, paranoia over the safety of her unborn child begins to control her life.

259.movie_plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

235.movie_plot: While Sheriff Brackett and Dr. Loomis hunt for Michael Myers, a traumatized Laurie is rushed to hospital, and the serial killer is not far behind her.

114.movie_plot: When twelve mysterious spacecrafts appear around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is tasked with interpreting the language of the apparent alien visitors.

212.movie_plot: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

197.movie_plot: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

222.movie_plot: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

149.movie_plot: A sweet mother takes a little too much at heart for the defense of her family.

154.movie_plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

262.movie_plot: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

250.movie_name: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning (1985)
250.movie_plot: The making of Friday the 13th: A New Beginning (1985) with interviews with the cast and crew.

61.movie_plot: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

145.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

177.movie_plot: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

66.movie_plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

72.movie_plot: Scientists discover how to make people invisible, but their test subject becomes an insane killer who stalks them.

56.movie_plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

132.movie_plot: (SIRIUS 6B, Year 2078) On a distant mining planet ravaged by a decade of war, scientists have created the perfect weapon: a blade-wielding, self-replicating race of killing devices known as...

6.movie_plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

263.movie_plot: Six complete strangers of widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

138.movie_plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

43.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

201.movie_plot: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who even slightly anger them.

78.movie_plot: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

208.movie_plot: A rich but jealous man hires a private investigator to kill his cheating wife and her new man. But, when blood is involved, nothing is simple.

106.movie_plot: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

96.movie_plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

35.movie_plot: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

10.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

136.movie_name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)

221.movie_plot: Tromaville has a monstrous new hero. The Toxic Avenger is born when meek mop boy Melvin falls into a vat of toxic waste. Now evildoers will have a lot to lose.

170.movie_plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

110.movie_plot: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield to kill again.

251.movie_name: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives (1986)

194.movie_plot: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

75.movie_name: Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear, The (1991)
75.movie_plot: Lieutenant Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

76.movie_plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

39.movie_plot: A local sheriff, a marine biologist and an old seafarer team up to hunt down a great white shark wrecking havoc in a beach resort.

176.movie_plot: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

209.movie_plot: Three Irish Catholic brothers from Long Island struggle to deal with love, marriage, and infidelity.

107.movie_plot: A year after disposing of the body of a man they accidentally killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.

69.movie_plot: An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.

147.movie_plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

4.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

213.movie_plot: Having revived from his wound, Jason Voorhees takes refuge at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds arrive for their vacation, Jason continues his killing spree.

58.movie_plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

29.movie_plot: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

162.movie_name: Tales from the Crypt Presents: Bordello of Blood (1996)

112.movie_plot: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

139.movie_plot: The adventures of Superman's cousin in her own superhero career.

202.movie_plot: John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, just as its new female owner catches Max's attention.

211.movie_plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

135.movie_plot: Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.

87.movie_plot: Aliens with conical crania crash-land on Earth.

196.movie_plot: Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.

1.movie_plot: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

164.movie_plot: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which, years before, was the site of a child's drowning.

210.movie_plot: A drug kingpin is released from prison and seeks to take total control of the criminal underworld in order to give back to the community.

193.movie_plot: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

64.movie_plot: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

120.movie_plot: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

167.movie_plot: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to the mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow.

104.movie_plot: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

24.movie_plot: A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

148.movie_plot: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group The Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

253.movie_name: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood (1988)
253.movie_plot: Years after Tommy Jarvis chained him underwater at Camp Crystal Lake, the dormant Jason Voorhees returns to the camp grounds when he is accidentally released from his prison by a telekinetic teenager.

113.movie_plot: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

131.movie_plot: A crew in Antarctica finds a neighboring camp destroyed and its crew dead. Whatever killed them is nowhere to be found, unless it's hidden in plain sight.

52.movie_plot: A Chinese man who travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

214.movie_plot: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

227.movie_plot: A German submarine is boarded by disguised American submariners trying to capture their Enigma cipher machine.

98.movie_plot: A young boy and a bunch of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

189.movie_plot: Convicted felon Nikita, instead of going to jail, is given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

25.movie_plot: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

156.movie_plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

184.movie_plot: The puppets return and hunt paranormal researchers in an attempt to take their brain fluid for their master, Andre Toulon.

233.movie_plot: Cyborg law enforcer RoboCop returns to protect the citizens of old Detroit but faces a deadly challenge when a rogue OCP member secretly creates a new, evil RoboCop 2.

19.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)
19.movie_plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

257.movie_plot: A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town.

93.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

51.movie_plot: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.

3.movie_plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

127.movie_plot: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

95.movie_plot: A young woman is forced to fulfill her destiny of fighting vampires and demons with the help of her friends all the while struggling to live a normal teenage life of heart break and drama.

21.movie_plot: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

180.movie_plot: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

134.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

108.movie_plot: When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster after reporting an unidentified structure, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.

124.movie_plot: An FBI agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.

146.movie_plot: The story of the final Emperor of China.

54.movie_plot: Female-born Teena Brandon adopts his male identity of Brandon Teena and attempts to find himself and love in Nebraska.

101.movie_plot: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

159.movie_plot: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

32.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
32.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

205.movie_plot: Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.

182.movie_plot: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

267.movie_plot: A teenage slacker's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.

244.movie_name: Nightmare on Elm Street Part 2: Freddy's Revenge, A (1985)
244.movie_plot: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by deceased child murderer Freddy Krueger, who is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.

89.movie_plot: A boy inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

260.movie_plot: A mysterious new shop opens in a small town which always seems to stock the deepest desires of each shopper, with a price far heavier than expected.

218.movie_plot: After a new neighbor moved into the house next door, Charley discovers that he is an ancient vampire and goes in search for the help of Peter Vincent, a famous "vampire killer" to save his neighborhood from the creature.

242.movie_name: Return of the Texas Chainsaw Massacre, The (1994)
242.movie_plot: This 55 minute documentary includes on-set footage and interviews with the cast and crew. It is a fascinating behind-the-scenes look at the film that went on to become the black sheep of the Texas Chainsaw franchise.

240.movie_plot: A radio host is victimized by the cannibal family as a former Texas Marshall hunts them.

116.movie_plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

188.movie_plot: An unfaithful wife encounters the zombie of her dead lover; the demonic cenobites are pursuing him after he escaped their sadomasochistic underworld.

166.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.
